body_html: Hi @rogermorgan unfortunately this seems to be a virtualenv with python3 issue you're hitting as opposed to a TensorFlow issue. Unfortunately it's not easily reproducible since it most like is an issue with the machine you're running on. I recommend maybe asking on StackOverFlow if any other users have seen this. Maybe you're hitting this?

body: Hi @rogermorgan unfortunately this seems to be a virtualenv with python3 issue you're hitting as opposed to a TensorFlow issue. Unfortunately it's not easily reproducible since it most like is an issue with the machine you're running on. I recommend maybe asking on StackOverFlow if any other users have seen this. Maybe you're hitting [this](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15954467/python-ssl-example-from-docs-gives-connection-reset-by-peer-error)?
